programmes.show_description: Action thriller with Nicolas Cage. A police officer takes matters into his own hands and assembles a group of strangers to help a single mother get vengeance on the men who raped her. (2017)
Crime drama based on true events. A ragtag group of ageing East End criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London. (2017)
Legend returns soon.
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home... Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. The chief of the Cherokee Nation is suspected of murder... S5, Ep13
The soldiers of fortune find themselves in trouble after arriving in a small town while searching for a missing precious-metals expert. S4, Ep18
A newlywed couple are involved in a car accident that sees a truck spill mysterious crystals onto the road that react with the atmosphere and kill them.
Sci-fi action. It's a deadly race against time to prevent a global disaster after a meteor crashes into the moon and puts it on a collision course with Earth. (2020)
Take a look at all the latest movies and series coming your way this month!
Western with Glenn Ford. A Chicago hotel clerk persuades a visiting cowboy to take him along on a 3,000 mile cattle drive, but soon discovers that the cowboy life isn't quite what he imagined. (1958)
Adventure comedy with John Wayne. An American soldier settles on a South Sea island after WWII, but the arrival of his friend's daughter throws his easy-going life into turmoil. (1963)
The team encounters a crewless starship and Kirk is placed in a difficult position by a Federation commander intent on violating the Prime Directive. S2, Ep23/26
When a laboratory owner uncovers an Invader is leasing his premises, he steals and hides valuable information from the alien. Can Vincent recover it?
An old buddy turns up at Face's high school reunion and requests the team's help in hunting down a sunken Spanish galleon full of treasure. S4, Ep19
Chuck Norris is Walker in this modern, high-kicking martial arts western. Alex is among those held hostage when a group of escaped prisoners take shelter in a church. S5, Ep14
Mountain adventure starring Chris O'Donnell. A climber must rescue his sister from certain death when she becomes stranded just a few hundred feet from the summit of K2. (2000)

Thriller with Antonio Banderas. An ageing mob hitman turns against his boss and sacrifices everything to rescue a young runaway from the very organisation he has dedicated his life to building. (2022)
Action adventure with Steven Seagal. Two special forces agents transporting a pair of female convicts to prison come under attack by a mercenary force sent to kill them. (2012)
Action thriller with Tyrese Gibson. An ex-Marine suffering from PTSD is forced to confront his fears when he and a group of innocent customers are taken hostage at a retail outlet. (2021)
Take a look at all the latest movies and series coming your way this month!
Legend returns soon.
Put the pleasure back into shopping from the comfort of your home and choose from a selection of innovative products.
Chuck Norris is Walker in this modern, high-kicking martial arts western. Alex is among those held hostage when a group of escaped prisoners take shelter in a church. S5, Ep14
An old buddy turns up at Face's high school reunion and requests the team's help in hunting down a sunken Spanish galleon full of treasure. S4, Ep19
When a laboratory owner uncovers an Invader is leasing his premises, he steals and hides valuable information from the alien. Can Vincent recover it?
Fantasy adventure. Odysseus and his men journey home after conquering the city of Troy, but they face perils from beyond their natural realm. (2017)
Take a look at all the latest movies and series coming your way this month!
Hammer drama starring Christopher Lee, Peter Cushing and 'the second Doctor' Patrick Troughton. Villagers suffer a stony fate when a Gorgon takes human form and starts terrorising locals. (1964)
Disaster drama with Charlton Heston. In the aftermath of a catastrophic earthquake in Los Angeles, an architect helping with the rescue effort searches the smouldering ruins for his wife. (1974)
The Enterprise is selected to test a new automated command system, but Kirk fears humans will become superfluous if machines take over galactic exploration. S2, Ep24/26
When a woman who was found dead after she fell from a horse miraculously turns up alive and the man who discovered her corpse disappears, Vincent investigates.
The team is enlisted to outmanoeuvre a couple of land swindlers plotting to evict a group of enterprising senior citizens. S4, Ep20
Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. When offered a job as a security chief at a resort, CD ends up investigating his predecessor's death. S5, Ep15
Sci-fi thriller with Logan Marshall-Green. A mugging victim left confined to a wheelchair seeks revenge with an experimental computer chip implant - until it starts taking over his body. (2018)
Action thriller sequel with Danny Trejo. The relentless Mexican mercenary is hired by the American president to stop a billionaire arms dealer's plot to start a nuclear war. (2013)
